head.title: Split {{FileFormatUp}} documents in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to split {{FileFormatUp}} files into separate documents. Manage PDFs, Word files, Excel sheets, PowerPoint slides, Visio files, images, archives, and more with ease.

header.title: Split {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{EnvNameShort}} applications by adding advanced document processing features. Easily split {{FileFormatUp}} files and work with a variety of popular business formats.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document processing library that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It enables merging, splitting, extracting, moving, swapping, and deleting pages, making document management more efficient.

more_features.title: Advanced document management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a rich set of features for processing over 50 commonly used business file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge different file formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, Visio diagrams, images, and archives. Customize the merging process for optimal results.

feature_2.title: Organize document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange pages by moving, swapping, or deleting them to structure your documents efficiently.

feature_3.title: Modify page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape orientations.

feature_4.title: Extract pages as separate files
feature_4.content: Select specific pages or a page range and save them as a new document in a chosen location.

formats.title: Split various file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file types, enabling quick and flexible document modification.
